These will implement the Normal distribution with the important difference that it will be impossible for the random variable to be a negative numberâ€”when a negative number appears, new random numbers are chosen, until a positive one appears.

## Creating rmytnorm()
```{r, results='hide', echo=FALSE}
  rmytnorm <- function(x,mean,sd){
    library(msm)
    n = rtnorm(x,mean,sd)
    return(n)
  }
```

```{r}
y <- rmytnorm(1000,10,2)

head(y)

hist(y)
```

## Creating dmytnorm()


```{r, results='hide', echo=FALSE}
  dmytnorm <- function(x,mean,sd){
    library(msm)
    n = dtnorm(x,mean,sd)
    return(n)
  }
?dtnorm
```

```{r }
x <- dmytnorm(-10:10,5,2)

head(x)

plot(x)
```
